EmailTemplate.description: Notify Sales Order owner that the contract is approved / Rejected

EmailTemplate.subject: {!EUR_CRM_Sales_Order__c.Name} for {!EUR_CRM_Sales_Order__c.EUR_CRM_Account__c} is {!EUR_CRM_Sales_Order__c.EUR_CRM_Approval_Status__c}
